titleStmt.title: An epistle to all professors in New-England, Germany, and other parts of the called Christian vvorld also to the Jews and Turks throughout the world, that they may see who are the true worshippers of God, that He seeks, and in what He is worshipped ... / George Fox.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Library of Congress.
